files.name: README.md
files.content:
# ryOS â€” A Web-Based Agentic AI OS

A modern web-based desktop environment inspired by classic macOS and Windows, built with React, TypeScript, and AI. Features multiple built-in applications, a familiar desktop interface, and a system-aware AI assistant. Works on all devicesâ€”desktop, tablet, and mobile.

## Features

### Desktop Environment
- Authentic macOS and Windows-style desktop interactions
- Multi-instance window manager with drag, resize, and minimize
- Customizable wallpapers (photos, patterns, or videos)
- System-wide sound effects and AI assistant (Ryo)
- Virtual file system with local storage persistence and backup/restore

### Themes
- **System 7** â€” Classic Mac OS look with top menubar
- **Aqua** â€” Mac OS X style with modern aesthetics
- **Windows XP** â€” Bottom taskbar and Start menu
- **Windows 98** â€” Retro Windows experience

### Built-in Applications
- **Finder** â€” File manager with Quick Access and storage info
- **TextEdit** â€” Rich text editor with markdown and multi-window support
- **MacPaint** â€” Bitmap graphics editor with tools and patterns
- **Videos** â€” VCR-style YouTube player with playlists
- **Soundboard** â€” Record and play custom sounds
- **Synth** â€” Virtual synthesizer with MIDI support
- **Photo Booth** â€” Camera app with filters
- **Internet Explorer** â€” Time Machine for web history with AI generation
- **Chats** â€” AI chat with Ryo, chat rooms, and voice messages
- **Control Panels** â€” System preferences and backup/restore
- **Minesweeper** â€” Classic puzzle game
- **Virtual PC** â€” DOS emulator for classic games
- **Terminal** â€” Unix-like CLI with AI integration
- **iPod** â€” Music player with lyrics and translation
- **Applet Store** â€” Browse and install community applets

## Quick Start
1. Launch apps from Finder, Desktop, or Apple/Start menu
2. Drag windows to move, drag edges to resize
3. Use Control Panels to customize appearance
4. Chat with Ryo AI for help or to control apps
5. Files auto-save to browser storage

Visit https://github.com/ryokun6/ryos for more information.

files.name: Quick Tips.md
files.content:
# Quick Tips

## Getting Started
- Launch apps from Finder, Desktop, or Apple/Start menu
- Multiple apps can run simultaneously
- Drag windows to move, drag edges to resize
- Use Control Panels to customize appearance and sounds

## Finder
- Browse Documents, Applications, and Trash
- Sort by name, kind, size, or date
- Icon and list view options
- Move files to Trash and empty when needed

## TextEdit
- Rich text editing with markdown support
- Format: bold, italic, underline, lists
- Slash commands (/) for quick formatting
- Multi-window support for multiple documents
- Auto-saves your work

## MacPaint
- Drawing tools: pencil, brush, spray, eraser
- Shape tools: rectangle, oval, line
- Fill patterns and colors
- Selection, move, and undo/redo
- Import/export images

## Soundboard
- Record sounds from microphone
- Play with clicks or number keys (1-9)
- Customize with emojis and titles
- Import/export soundboards

## Synth
- Play with on-screen keyboard or computer keys
- Waveforms: sine, square, sawtooth, triangle
- Effects: reverb, delay, distortion
- MIDI keyboard support
- Save and load presets

## Photo Booth
- Take photos with webcam
- Real-time filters and effects
- Brightness and contrast controls
- Export to Files

## Control Panels
- Change wallpapers (photos, patterns, videos)
- Toggle UI, typing, and terminal sounds
- Backup and restore all settings
- Format or reset file system

## Internet Explorer
- Time travel with Wayback Machine
- AI generates sites for years before 1996 or in the future
- Save favorites by year

## Chats with Ryo
- Chat with Ryo AI for help or to control apps
- Create applets, edit documents, search the store
- Join public chat rooms (@ryo for AI responses)
- Push-to-talk voice messages (hold Space)
- Send ðŸ‘‹ nudge for context-aware tips
- Ryo becomes a DJ when music is playing

## Videos
- VCR-style YouTube player
- Shuffle and repeat modes
- LCD display with scrolling titles

## Virtual PC
- DOS emulator for classic games
- Doom, SimCity, and more
- Save game states

## Terminal
- Unix-like commands (ls, cd, cat, touch, vim)
- Arrow keys for command history
- `ryo <prompt>` to chat with AI

## iPod
- Import YouTube URLs for music library
- Click-wheel navigation
- Shuffle and loop modes
- Time-synced lyrics with translation
- Gesture controls for lyric timing
- Fullscreen lyrics with video support

## Applet Store
- Browse and install community applets
- One-click updates
- Share your own applets
